mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_pet (user_no, pet_name, pet_age, pet_kind , pet_gender,pet_photo, hashtag, addr , add_detail) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{petName}, #{petAge}, #{petKind} , #{petGender}, #{petPhoto}, #{hashtag}, #{addr} , #{addDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT P.pet_no , P.pet_name , P.pet_age , P.pet_kind , P.pet_gender , P.pet_photo , P.pet_date_time , P.hashtag , U.addr , U.add_detail ,P.likes , P.hits FROM tbl_pet P GROUP BY LEFT JOIN tbl_user U ON P.user_no = U.user_no WHERE U.addr = #{addr} and U.add_detail=#{addDetail}
SELECT pet_no,pet_name,pet_name,pet_age,pet_kind, pet_gender,pet_photo FROM tbl_pet WHERE pet_no = #{petNo}
SELECT user_no, pet_no, pet_name,pet_age ,pet_kind,pet_gender,pet_photo FROM tbl_pet WHERE user_No = #{userNo}
select add_detail from tbl_user where addr=#{addr} group by add_detail

SELECT P.pet_no , P.pet_name , P.pet_age , P.pet_kind , P.pet_gender , P.pet_photo , P.pet_date_time , P.hashtag , U.addr , U.add_detail ,P.likes , P.hits From tbl_pet P LEFT JOIN tbl_user U ON P.user_no = U.user_no where add_detail=#{add_detail} Order by rand() Limit 1;
